const modal = document.querySelector(`[data-modal=\"${event.target.dataset.open}\"]`);\n        modal.style.display = \"flex\";\n    });\n});\n\nmodalClose.forEach(button => {\n    button.addEventListener('click', event => {\n        const modal = document.querySelector(`[data-modal=\"${event.target.dataset.close}\"]`);\n        modal.style.display = \"none\";\n document.querySelectorAll(\"[data-letter]\");\nlet activeLetters = [];\nconst maxResults = 6;\n\ndataLetters.forEach(letter => {\n  letter.addEventListener(\"click\", function() {\n    if (this.classList.contains(\"letter-active\")) {\n      this.classList.remove(\"letter-active\");\n      activeLetters = activeLetters.filter(a => a !== this.dataset.letter);\n    } else {\n      this.classList.add(\"letter-active\");\n      activeLetters.push(this.dataset.letter);\n    }\n    if (activeLetters.length == 0) {\n      document.querySelector(\"[data-teleport='results']\").style.display = \"none\";\n      return;\n    }\n    showResults();\n  });\n});\n\nconst showResults = () => {\n  fetch(\"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Shivanshu-Gupta/web-scrapers/master/medical_ner/medicinenet-diseases.json\")\n    .then(response => response.json())\n    .then(data => {\n      const filteredData = data.filter(item => {\n        const firstLetter = item.disease.charAt(0).toLowerCase();\n        if (activeLetters.includes(firstLetter)) {\n          return true;\n        }\n        return false;\n      });\n\n      document.querySelector(\"[data-teleport='results']\").style.display = \"flex\";\n      const resultsContainer = document.querySelector(\"[data-results='letters']\");\n      resultsContainer.innerHTML = \"\";\n\n      let counter = 0;\n      const diseaseGroups = {};\n      const totalActiveLetters = activeLetters.length;\n\n      filteredData.forEach(disease => {\n        const firstLetter = disease.disease[0].toLowerCase();\n        if (diseaseGroups[firstLetter]) {\n          diseaseGroups[firstLetter].push(disease);\n        } else {\n          diseaseGroups[firstLetter] = [disease];\n        }\n      });\n\n      Object.keys(diseaseGroups).sort().forEach((firstLetter, index) => {\n        const diseasesForThisLetter = diseaseGroups[firstLetter];\n        const diseasesToShow = diseasesForThisLetter.slice(0, Math.ceil(maxResults / totalActiveLetters));\n\n        diseasesToShow.forEach(disease => {\n          const resultContainer = document.createElement(\"div\");\n          resultContainer.classList.add(\"search-result\");\n          resultContainer.classList.add(\"invisible\");\n          resultContainer.style.animationDelay = `${counter * 0.25}s`;\n\n          const resultText = document.createElement(\"span\");\n          resultText.classList.add(\"result-text\");\n          resultText.textContent = disease.disease;\n\n          resultContainer.appendChild(resultText);\n          resultsContainer.appendChild(resultContainer);\n          counter++;\n\n          if (counter === maxResults) {\n            const moreContainer = document.createElement(\"div\");\n            moreContainer.classList.add(\"search-result\");\n            moreContainer.classList.add(\"more-results\");\n\n            const moreText = document.createElement(\"span\");\n            moreText.classList.add(\"result-text\");\n            moreText.textContent = \"More\";\n\n            moreContainer.appendChild(moreText);\n            resultsContainer.appendChild(moreContainer);\n            addedMoreContainer = true;\n            return;\n          }\n        });\n      });\n    });\n};\n\n</script>\n"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"home-container7",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Script,{html:"<script>\nfunction scroll(direction) {\n  const doctorsDiv = document.querySelector('[data-teleport=\"doctors\"]');\n  const scrollAmount = 300;\n  if (direction === 'previous') {\n    doctorsDiv.scrollBy({\n      left: -scrollAmount,\n      behavior: 'smooth'\n    });\n  } else if (direction === 'next') {\n    doctorsDiv.scrollBy({\n      left: scrollAmount,\n      behavior: 'smooth'\n    });\n  }\n}\n\n\n</script>"})})})]});};export default Home;

sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Script from 'dangerous-html/react'; import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet'; import Doctor from '../components/doctor'; import Features from '../components/features'; import Lightbox from '../components/lightbox'; import Practice from '../components/practice'; import Testimonal from '../components/testimonal'; import './home.css'; import axios from 'axios'; // Import axios for making HTTP requests import './home.css'; const Home = (props) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', date: '', timeSlot: '', practice: '' }); const [formSubmitted, setFormSubmitted] = useState(false); const [lightboxOpen, setLightboxOpen] = useState(false); const handleLightboxClose = () => { setLightboxOpen(false); }; const handleSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); // Prevent default form submission behavior // Check if any required field is empty if ( !formData.name || !formData.email || !formData.phone || !formData.date || !formData.timeSlot || !formData.practice ) { console.log('Required fields are empty. Form submission halted.'); return; // Exit function if any required field is empty } // Check if any validation errors exist if ( formData.nameError || formData.emailError || formData.phoneError || formData.dateError || formData.timeSlotError || formData.practiceError ) { console.log('Validation errors exist. Form submission halted.'); return; // Exit function if there are validation errors } try { // Send a POST request to your backend server const response = await axios.post('http://localhost:3001/submit-form', formData); console.log(response.data); // Log the response from the server // Reset the form after successful submission setFormData({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', date: '', timeSlot: '', practice: '', nameError: '', // Clear name error message emailError: '', // Clear email error message phoneError: '', // Clear phone error message dateError: '', // Clear date error message timeSlotError: '', // Clear time slot error message practiceError: '', // Clear practice error message }); // Clear error messages const errorMessages = document.querySelectorAll(".error-message"); errorMessages.forEach(message => message.textContent = ''); // Display the confirmation message setFormSubmitted(true); setLightboxOpen(true); // Ensure that the confirmation message is properly assigned const confirmationMessage = document.querySelector(".home-text30"); if (confirmationMessage) { confirmationMessage.style.display = "block"; } else { console.error("Element with class 'home-text30' not found."); } } catch (error) { console.error('Error submitting form:', error); } }; const getCurrentDate = () => { const today = new Date(); let month = (today.getMonth() + 1).toString(); let day = today.getDate().toString(); const year = today.getFullYear().toString(); if (month.length === 1) { month = '0' + month; } if (day.length === 1) { day = '0' + day; } return `${year}-${month}-${day}`; }; document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() { const form = document.querySelector(".home-form form"); form.addEventListener("submit", handleSubmit); }); const handleChange = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target; let errorMessage = ''; // Handle Empty Inputs if (!value.trim()) { errorMessage = `${name.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + name.slice(1)} is required.`; } // Name Validation (Non-empty) if (name === 'name' && value.trim()) { // Reset error message if name is not empty errorMessage = ''; } // Email Validation (Gmail) if (name === 'email' && value.trim()) { const isValidEmail = /\b[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@gmail.com\b/.test(value); if (!isValidEmail) { errorMessage = 'Please enter a valid Gmail address.'; } } // Phone Number Validation (10 digits) if (name === 'phone' && value.trim()) { const isValidPhoneNumber = /^\d{10}$/.test(value); if (!isValidPhoneNumber) { errorMessage = 'Please enter a 10-digit phone number.'; } } // Update the formData state for the specific input field that is being changed setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value, // Store the error message for display [`${name}Error`]: errorMessage // Example: nameError, emailError, or phoneError }); }; return (
